text:
Yvonne Blake (1940 – 17 July 2018) was a British-born Spanish costume designer. She was born in Manchester. Blake won an Academy Award for Best Costume Design for the movie "Nicholas and Alexandra". She also won four Goya Awards and was nominated for the BAFTA Awards and the Emmy Awards.
Blake was also known for her production design in "Jesus Christ Superstar" and "Superman".
Blake died on 17 July 2018 in Madrid from complications of a stroke at the age of 78.

annotations.surface_form: Academy Award for Best Costume Design
